description.0: Modpack compiling the mods permitted by the rules on Minebox; any additional mods are beyond my responsibility if you face sanctions.
description.1: MineboxAdditions is a mod that adds blatant features to your average Minebox gameplay !
description.2: Notra is a simple utility mod built with fabric specifically for Minebox.
description.3: An interactive web-based map for the Minebox server, helping players explore and navigate the world with ease.
description.4: A highly customizable JourneyMap addon that makes waypoints for MineBox.
description.5: The Minebox Plus pack fills in the missing textures for the Server Resource Pack available at minebox.co.
description.6: An add-on for Minebox Plus that changes the appearance of immature crops to grayscale.
description.7: An add-on for Minebox Plus that removes the default Bushy Leaves effect from Minebox.
